title: Standardise on PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source relational database that supports strong ACID guarantees and has good support for transactions.

arguments.argument: May not be the best choice for document-oriented workloads

title: Standardise on MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a popular, open-source NoSQL database that supports flexible schema and has good support for document-oriented workloads.

arguments.argument: May not provide strong ACID guarantees

title: Allow teams to choose their own strategy
description: This option allows each team to choose the best database solution for their specific needs, but may lead to unnecessary tool sprawl and increased complexity.
